global.who: Who loves to create aesthetic and functional web applications.
global.about: Hello! I'm a 𝗙𝘂𝗹𝗹 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗠𝗘𝗥𝗡 Developer who loves to create aesthetic and functional web applications. I am a highly motivated professional who loves to work in challenging environments that allow me to grow and improve my skills. I have experience in a simulated real work environment. I am passionate about solving problems, design, teamwork and constantly learning. With all my knowledge I am sure that I can contribute great ideas and solutions. You will have the best of me working on demanding projects, implementing AGILE.
global.span-tech: Technologies that I've been working on:
global.name: Name
global.valor: Hey There! How are you doing? I'm interested in working with you. Let's talk!
global.card-motor: Application dedicated to lovers of high-end vehicles, in it you can see all the available models, consult a budget and also buy brand merch.
global.card-traver: Application designed for travelers, in it you can find your ideal vacation, it has a section of hotels and cities where you can leave comments about your experience and reactions
global.card-pet: E-commerce application created for your best friend, in it you can find toys and remedies for pets
